item.title: 亚洲经济增长担忧加剧，"坏消息就是坏消息"？
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Illumina 将于 6 月分拆 Grail 公司
item.description: 基因测序仪制造商 Illumina 周一表示，预计将分拆癌症测试制造商 Grail。【原文：Illumina , a maker of gene sequencing machines, said on Monday it expected to spin off cancer test maker Grail .】

item.title: 美国上诉法院阻止黑人女性企业拨款计划
item.description: 风险投资基金无畏基金（Fearless Fund）不能恢复向黑人女性拥有的企业提供资助，美国上诉法院周一作出了有分歧的裁决，支持一个就该计划提起诉讼的反平权行动组织。【原文：Venture capital fund Fearless Fund cannot resume making grants to Black women-owned businesses, a divided U.S. appeals court ruled on Monday, siding with an anti-affirmative action group that sued over the program.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特的 PacifiCorp 公用事业公司达成 1.78 亿美元野火赔偿协议
item.description: 亿万富翁沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下的公用事业公司 PacifiCorp 周一表示，同意支付 1.78 亿美元，以解决 403 名原告因 2020 年俄勒冈州两场野火而提出的索赔。【原文：PacifiCorp, a utility owned by billionaire Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway , said on Monday it agreed to pay $178 million to resolve claims by 403 plaintiffs arising from two Oregon wildfires in 2020.】

item.title: 据 Business Insider 报道，微软将在 Azure 云计算部门裁员数百人
item.description: 据 Business Insider 周一援引知情人士的话报道，微软正在其 Azure 云计算部门裁员数百人。【原文：Microsoft is cutting hundreds of jobs at its Azure cloud unit, Business Insider reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 如果上诉获胜，美国航空公司将考虑成立新的捷蓝航空公司
item.description: 美国航空公司周一告诉上诉法院，如果它赢得一项裁决，推翻 2023 年 5 月要求它结束联盟的决定，它将考虑与捷蓝航空公司达成新的安排。【原文：American Airlines told an appeals court Monday would consider a new arrangement with JetBlue Airways if it wins a ruling reversing a May 2023 decision requiring it to end an alliance.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，道明银行佛罗里达州前雇员被控开设欺诈性账户
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，道明银行一名前雇员伪造文件开设了数十个账户，并提供类似礼宾服务的服务，帮助现金跨境流动。【原文：A former TD Bank employee falsified documents to open dozens of accounts and provided concierge-like services to help cash flow across borders, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 马士基上调 2024 年业绩预期，原因是需求强劲和红海航线中断
item.description: 丹麦航运集团 AP Moeller-Maersk 周一在一个月内第二次上调了全年利润指导，原因是集装箱市场需求强劲，以及红海危机造成的干扰。【原文：Danish shipping group AP Moeller-Maersk on Monday raised its full-year profit guidance for the second time in a month on the back of strong container market demand and disruptions caused by the crisis in the Red Sea.】

item.title: 美国金融监管局公布非银行企业违规者登记册
item.description: 美国消费者金融监督机构周一宣布建立一个公共数据库，以识别被发现违反消费者法律的非银行金融公司，并称这将有助于抓住和阻止企业惯犯。【原文：The U.S. consumer financial watchdog agency on Monday announced the creation of a public database to identify nonbank financial companies caught violating consumer laws, saying it would help catch and deter corporate repeat offenders.】

item.title: 4 月份美国低收入人群预订酒店数量减少，影响了行业前景
item.description: 商业房地产分析公司 CoStar 的数据显示，由于储蓄减少、信用卡拖欠率上升以及通货膨胀影响了家庭预算，收入较低的美国人在 4 月份缩减了旅游支出。【原文：Lower-income Americans dialed back their travel spending in April as reduced savings, higher credit card delinquencies, and inflation weighed on household budgets, according to data from commercial real estate analytics firm CoStar.】

item.title: 对冲基金抛售股票，看涨押注损害业绩，摩根士丹利称
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在一份报告中称，由于美国主要股指下跌并打击了对冲基金的多头押注，全球对冲基金上周抛售了股票，这对他们的投资组合来说是痛苦的一周。【原文：Global hedge funds dumped equities last week, in a painful week for their portfolios as the U.S. main indexes fell and hit their long bets, Morgan Stanley said in a note.】

item.title: Skydance 等待派拉蒙增价收购的消息
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士称，Skydance Media 周一正在等待各方对其增强对娱乐集团派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）出价的回应，Skydance Media 在出价中提出以每股 15 美元的价格购买近一半无投票权的派拉蒙股票。【原文：Skydance Media on Monday was awaiting a response to its enhanced bid for entertainment conglomerate Paramount Global , in which it offered to buy nearly half of the nonvoting Paramount shares at $15 each, according to a source familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，EEX与纳斯达克的交易面临被调查的风险，因为补救措施被认为不够充分
item.description: 直接了解此事的人士周一表示，欧洲能源交易所与纳斯达克的交易有可能遭到欧盟反垄断监管机构的全面调查，除非德意志交易所（Deutsche Boerse）加强补救措施以解决竞争问题。【原文：European Energy Exchange's Nasdaq deal risks a full-scale investigation by EU antitrust regulators unless the Deutsche Boerse unit beefs up remedies to address competition concerns, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 沙特 Flyadeal 公司考虑增加空客或波音宽体喷气机
item.description: 沙特廉价航空公司 flyadeal 正在研究可能订购 10 至 20 架宽体喷气式飞机，以运载更多乘客，并可能在今年年底前做出决定。【原文：Saudi budget airline flyadeal is studying a possible order for between 10 and 20 wide-body jets to carry more passengers, and could make a decision by the end of the year.】

item.title: 独家报道备忘录显示摩根大通支付主管乔治亚科普洛斯将离职
item.description: 据路透社周一看到的一份内部备忘录显示，摩根大通全球支付业务主管塔基斯-乔治亚科普洛斯（Takis Georgakopoulos）自 2017 年以来一直领导着这一每天 10 万亿美元的业务，他将离职以寻求其他机会。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's global head of payments, Takis Georgakopoulos, is leaving to pursue other opportunities after leading the $10 trillion-a-day business since 2017, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份建筑支出再次下滑
item.description: 由于非住宅活动减少，4 月份美国建筑支出连续第二个月意外下降，不过单户住宅建筑支出攀升至 2022 年 8 月以来的最高点。【原文：U.S. construction spending fell unexpectedly for a second consecutive month in April on declines in non-residential activity, though outlays for single-family home building climbed to the highest since August 2022.】

item.title: 美国对汉莎航空、荷航和南非航空罚款 250 万美元
item.description: 美国运输部周一表示，已对汉莎航空、法航旗下荷兰皇家航空和南非航空处以总计 250 万美元的民事罚款。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department said Monday it has imposed $2.5 million in civil penalties in total against Lufthansa , Air France unit KLM Royal Dutch Airways and South African Airways.】

item.title: NYSE Equities 调查有关 LULD 波段的技术问题
item.description: 纽约证券交易所股票部周一表示，目前正在调查一个有关限涨限跌波段的技术问题，该问题导致数十只在该交易所上市的股票出现波动暂停。【原文：NYSE Equities said on Monday it was currently investigating a reported technical issue regarding Limit Up-Limit Down bands, sending dozens of stocks listed on the exchange into volatility pauses.】

item.title: ISM 称美国 5 月份工厂活动连续第二个月下滑
item.description: 周一的一项月度调查显示，由于新商品订单创下近两年来的最大降幅，美国制造业活动在5月份连续第二个月放缓，但衡量投入通胀的指标从2022年中期以来的最高点回落。【原文：U.S. manufacturing activity slowed for a second straight month in May as new goods orders dropped by the most in nearly two years, but a measure of input inflation fell back from the highest since mid-2022, a monthly survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西经济预计在第一季度加快步伐
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，在联邦支出增加、家庭支出和私人投资增长的推动下，巴西经济预计将在今年第一季度加快步伐。【原文：Brazil's economy is forecast to have picked up pace in the first quarter of the year, a Reuters poll showed, driven by an increase in federal outlays that added to stronger household spending and private investment.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局对 74,702 辆日产 Rogue 汽车展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周一表示，已对 74702 辆日产 Rogue Select 汽车的侧帘式安全气囊意外展开调查。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Monday it has opened a probe into 74,702 Nissan Rogue Select vehicles due to the inadvertent deployment of side curtain airbags.】

item.title: 在 ISS 敦促股东拒绝马斯克薪酬方案后，特斯拉仍坚持马斯克的薪酬方案
item.description: 特斯拉周一为批准首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）560亿美元薪酬方案的提议进行了辩护，并表示新的薪酬方案成本会更高，几天前一家顶级代理咨询公司建议股东投票反对该提议。【原文：Tesla on Monday defended a proposal to ratify CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package and said a new compensation would be costlier, days after a top proxy advisory firm recommended shareholders to vote against the proposal.】

item.title: 精神航空任命布莱恩-麦克梅纳米为临时首席财务官
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周一任命布莱恩-麦克梅纳米（Brian McMenamy）为临时首席财务官，自 6 月 14 日起生效。【原文：Spirit Airlines on Monday named Brian McMenamy as interim chief financial officer, effective June 14.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空预计第二季度收入将因健康的旅行需求而增加
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周一预测，由于旅游需求健康，第二季度收入降幅将小于此前预测，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 2.3%。【原文：JetBlue Airways on Monday forecast a smaller drop in second-quarter revenue than it had previously forecast due to healthy travel demand, sending its shares up 2.3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 独家报道首席执行官称：Arm 的目标是在五年内占领 50% 的 PC 市场份额
item.description: 在微软及其硬件合作伙伴准备推出一批基于这家英国公司技术的新电脑之际，芯片设计公司Arm Holdings的首席执行官表示，Arm Holdings的目标是在五年内获得Windows PC市场50%以上的份额。【原文：Arm Holdings aims to gain more than 50% of the Windows PC market in five years, the chip designer's CEO said, as Microsoft and its hardware partners prepare to launch a new batch of computers based on the British firm's technology.】

item.title: 英伟达凭借人工智能驱动的涨势领跑五月全球市值涨幅榜
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）5 月份的市值涨幅居全球公司之首，因其丰厚的收入预期增强了投资者对人工智能推动的芯片需求激增的信心，从而带来了令人惊叹的涨势。【原文：Nvidia led global companies in market cap gains in May, buoyed by a stunning rally as its bumper revenue forecast reinforced investor confidence in the AI-driven surge in chip demand.】

item.title: 比尔-阿克曼的潘兴广场公司以 10.5 亿美元出售 10% 股份
item.description: 亿万富翁比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）周一表示，它已以 10.5 亿美元的价格向一个投资者财团出售了 10% 的股份。【原文：Billionaire Bill Ackman's Pershing Square Capital Management said on Monday it has sold a 10% stake for $1.05 billion to a consortium of investors.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索下跌近 3%，谢因鲍姆压倒性优势引发改革忧虑
item.description: 墨西哥比索兑美元汇率周一下跌近 3%，此前克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）在总统选举中取得压倒性胜利，执政联盟有望获得超级多数席位，市场担心这将带来宪法变革。【原文：Mexico's peso slipped nearly 3% against the dollar on Monday after Claudia Sheinbaum won a landslide victory in the presidential election and the ruling coalition looked poised for a super-majority that markets fear could bring constitutional change.】

item.title: 夏季交易开始，超级大盘股提振纳斯达克期货
item.description: 纳斯达克指数期货周一领涨华尔街，并将以积极的姿态开始 6 月份的第一个交易日，因为大型成长股上涨，在上周五收红后收复了一些失地。【原文：Nasdaq futures led Wall Street gains on Monday and were set to begin June's first trading day on a positive note as megacap growth stocks rose, recovering some ground after closing Friday's session in the red.】

item.title: Spotify 提高美国高级计划价格以增加利润
item.description: Spotify 周一提高了其在美国的高级计划价格，这是这家瑞典音乐流媒体服务公司为提高利润率而采取的最新举措。【原文：Spotify raised prices for its premium plans in the United States on Monday, the latest step by the Swedish music-streaming service in its push to increase margins.】
